query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

warnings.message: One of the fields on which a sort was requested does not exist

result.title: TRICK Impact final assessment
result.description: Trick lesson learned. It will encompass all the technical bricks and services focus on adding value on both industrial actors along the supply chain and consumers. In addition, it will capture and analyse the feedback received form the involved workers into the supply-chain (e.g. IT managers, production responsible, managers, etc.) also the TRICK impact will encourage a value-driven collaboration among manufacturers and consumers. D5,8 will include a synthesis of the evaluation results of D5.6 and D5.7, including recommendations for further research and development of business launch of the TRICK solution.It will contribute in policy issues(Output of T5.5)

result.title: Report Potential contribution to standardisation from TRICK project
result.description: This deliverable will report the outcomes and learnt lessons from TRICK that have a potential impact on the existing standards or new standardisation initiatives. D7.7 will describe the contribution to standard discussion (the need for new standards or the updated of current ones) for the use and sharing of data for the traceability and circularity purposes, and for the interoperability of block chains.It will contribute in policy issues(Output of T7.4)

result.title: TRICK scale up strategy
result.description: It will provide the evaluation of the final results of TRICK to define the long-term roadmap, timing and resources needed to pass to TRICK commercial exploitation and the business plan of TRICK EEIG. It will define the TRICK value proposition, including consideration about the affordability by SMEs. It will contribute in policy issues(Output of T6.5)

result.title: Performance evaluation report of TC pilot
result.description: It will collect the measure of KPIs against the baseline in TC pilot and the impact evaluation, not only for the end user but for all the stakeholders of the 5 target groups of the project. It will include the PEF studies of TC sector. This evaluation will compare the before situation defined into D1.2 with the situation during and after the pilot implementation.(Output of T5.3)

result.title: TRICK platform architecture
result.description: It will provide the report from T2.1, the model architecture of core services, with all its core elements, modules and mapping over the use-cases. Data interface(s) will be defined. The system will meet all functional and non-functional requirements, user and application requirements, documenting the information exchange requirements among them. A secure framework to assure the security-by-design and privacy-by-design approaches will be adopted. (Output of T2.1)

result.title: Risk Management and Quality Plan
result.description: This deliverable will describe quality guidelines outlining project timing, quality procedures, deliverables production procedures and deliverable review process, together with the advanced contingency plan. About the risk management D8.2 will provide the procedure to detect, analyse and mitigate risks (e.g. risk log). About the Quality Plan D8.2 will include the list of peer reviewer for each deliverable. D8.5 will include also guidelines for software quality, provided by the Technical Manager.(Output of T8.4)

result.title: Scientific, legal and technical framework
result.description: A report providing the Legal Framework and guidelines, including anonymization, confidentiality, authentication, authorization aspects, for environmental, social and health protection. result.title: Trick requirements
result.description: It will provide platform, B2B marketplace and service requirementsD1.5 describes the functional, non-functional and testable requirements, accompanying stakeholder needs, barriers, and believes, starting KPIs for the evaluation, and the expected measurable benefits. In particular, functional requirements encompass the definition of functionalities for circular information management. On the other side, the non-functional requirements encompass privacy and security aspects for TRICK services. Finally, testable requirements are defined to drive the test and deployment of new services (for example by following check-list approach, test automation, etc.). (Output of T1.2, T1.5)

result.title: Project Reference Manual
result.description: It is the project handbook with the management procedures to be applied to all project activities and results. The project handbook summarizes qualitative work material (templates) and guidelines for work. (Output of T8.1)

result.title: Market analysis (first version)
result.description: Report exploring the analysed market opportunities. The Market analysis (Value-chain analysis, competition evaluation, market segmentation and sizing, business expectations) will define a successful strategic positioning of TRICK.(Output of T7.2)

result.title: Harmonized set of semantic standards, ontologies, nomenclatures
result.description: Guidelines for the semantic data sharing and for the PEF studies execution. The data sharing will focus on three main axes: technical, social and environment. Ethics will be considered too, where appropriated. Starting from available standards and official nomenclatures, the deliverable will propose the ontologies to represent concepts, properties and relations. D1.4 will be able to represent other manufacturing sectors connected to TRICK pilots, which improves the adoption and exploitation later into the project.It will contribute in policy issues(Output of T1.4)
